definition: the common gull of Eurasia and northeastern North America, cry like a cat
details:
noun
- the common gull of Eurasia and northeastern North America
= synonyms: mew gull, sea mew
- the sound made by a cat (or any sound resembling this)
= synonyms: meow, miaou, miaow, miaul
verb
- cry like a cat
= synonyms: meow
- utter a high-pitched cry, as of seagulls
